name: unbracketed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unbracketed text is not in brackets (= two symbols, put around a word, phrase, or sentence in a piece of writing to separate it from the main part): In the transcript, unbracketed ellipses represent a hesitation, and bracketed ones signal an omission. The unbracketed symbols reflect a compromise between phonetic accuracy and the constrants of the keyboard. Related word
bracket
More examplesFewer examplesNotes in sections written by others are colour-coded and unbracketed.Editor's notes are unbracketed and indicated by asterisks in the text.Throughout the document, there is far more bracketed than unbracketed text.
